step.para: Restart all services. See the Newton upgrade guide for enabling designate-producer and designate-worker.

listitem.para: The notifications Designate emits via MQ are now pluggable, drivers are defined by python entrypoints and the new notification_plugin option in the DEFAULT config section enables selection. By default, the notifications have not changed. There is an audit plugin that can be used, if desired.
